mapper.select: select kp.point_id, kp.subject_id, kp.chapter_id, kp.title, kp.summary, kp.difficulty, kp.importance, kp.author_name, kp.view_count, kp.like_count, kp.collect_count, kp.create_time, ks.subject_name, kc.chapter_name from knowledge_collect kc left join knowledge_point kp on kc.point_id = kp.point_id left join knowledge_subject ks on kp.subject_id = ks.subject_id left join knowledge_chapter kch on kp.chapter_id = kch.chapter_id where kc.user_id = #{userId} and kp.status = 1 order by kc.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into knowledge_collect(user_id, point_id, folder_id, create_time) values(#{userId}, #{pointId}, #{folderId}, sysdate())
mapper.delete: delete from knowledge_collect where user_id = #{userId} and point_id = #{pointId}
